hints.content:
To find the difference, we start with the length of $\purpleD{\text{Olaf's arm}}$ and subtract the length of the $\blueE{\text{Olaf's nose}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/51bb1c708299efff4c5643bb3dd9415aa0a0b0ea)

$\purpleD{24} \text { inches}-\blueE{7} \text { inches}= \maroonD{\Large\Box} \text{ inches}$

Let's subtract to find the difference.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3d7ce405a8ed06bbb5893f6cd083bc3c1682dac7)

$\purpleD{24}\text{ inches}  - \blueE{7}\text{ inches}  = \maroonD{17}\text{ inches} $
Olaf's arm is $\maroonD{17}\text{ in}$ longer than his nose.

question.content:
Olaf measured his arm and nose to see how long they were. The carrot for his nose measures $7$ inches long. The branch for his arm measures $24$ inches long.

**How much longer is Olaf's arm than his nose?**  

[[â˜ƒ numeric-input 1]] $\text{inches}$
